content.rendered:
[vc_row type=”container”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Accu-Beam® Zoom Endoscope Couplers connect any C-mount camera to any standard endoscope. The patented parfocal zoom and focus control ensure the best possible image.

  • Available in 13-28mm and 22.5-50mm parfocal zoom
  • Focus-control to fine tune your image
  • Insulated
  • Sterilization validated
  • Leak tested
  • Eyepiece clamp will accommodate a standard 32mm eyepiece.
  • Compatible with C-mount or SLR cameras

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_gallery type=”flexslider_slide” interval=”3″ images=”72475,72476,72479″ img_size=”400×267″ css=”.vc_custom_1573859869214{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_separator color=”#e5e5e5″ type=”normal” thickness=”1″ up=”” down=””][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Zoom Couplers

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Our Accu-Beam® Zoom Couplers utilize patented parfocal zoom to get you the best image on any camera. They work with any standard C-mount camera and also have magnification ideal for SLR cameras. The optical zoom function not only allows the operator to get a detailed view, but increases the range of camera compatibility.

Available in 13-28mm and 22.5-50mm zoom, the Zoom Couplers cover the widest range of camera compatibility. Focus control ensures the best image for your camera and a quality, sterilizable design ensures the coupler will last as long as you need it.

Part # 8019I – 13-28mm Zoom
Part # 8020I – 22.5-50mm Zoom

U.S. Patent No. 6,155,973[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_tta_tabs color=”white” active_section=”1″][vc_tta_section title=”Compatibility” tab_id=”1569386751404-824b66ba-0d540b5d-00a4″][vc_column_text]Compatible with all C-mount video cameras and many SLR cameras.

Compatible with endoscopes using a standard 32mm eyepiece.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Regulatory” tab_id=”1569386751419-a33a2db6-6e3d0b5d-00a4″][vc_column_text]Zoom Endoscope Couplers are class 1 devices, and are approved to bear the CE mark.

TTI Medical is registered with the FDA and ISO 13485:2016 certified.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Warranty” tab_id=”1569387831165-1b59dea1-014a0b5d-00a4″][vc_column_text]

All of our products include a 1 year manufacturer’s warranty and support for the usable lifetime of the product.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row]
